data.text: @CommunitySolsED @DavidPepper @CDCgov Remember when 1,000 National Guard were deployed in Ohio, mostly around Canton, Akron and Cleveland where hospitals are struggling to keep up with unvaccinated IDIOTS who are sick Delta variant, inundating hospitals. #Omicron is right around the corner. https://t.co/Utu27cIuMI
@befuzled @CommunitySolsED @jake_zuckerman @CDCgov As usual, the most vulnerable pay for the convenience of the privileged.
